job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description: **This is a fulltime role and doesn't sponsor** REQUIREMENTS/CHARACTERISTICS: 10 years’ experience building large scale, real-time distributed systems with solid coding,problem-solving, and design skills Experience working in highly collaborative teams Ability to demonstrate a team-first attitude towards software development Hands on Experience with Python, Java, SQL Experience working with various data stores: SQL, NoSQL, and/or key-value store Mature engineering practices (CI/CD, testing, secure coding, etc) Experience with, or willingness to learn: Event-driven architecture and messaging frameworks (Pub/Sub, Kafka, and/or RabbitMQ) Cloud infrastructure (Google Cloud Platform, AWS, and/or Azure)
